snippet: Hundreds of Vermonters packed the Statehouse in Montpelier on Tuesday for a committee hearing on legislation that would expand background checks for gun buyers and impose other new firearms restrictions.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of Vermonters packed the Statehouse in Montpelier on Tuesday for a committee hearing on legislation that would expand background checks for gun buyers and impose other new firearms restrictions.

headline.main: Vermont: Hearing on Gun Law Draws Large Crowd at Statehouse
headline.print_headline: Vermont: Hearing On Gun Law Draws Large Crowd at Statehouse
